body_html: Thanks @rryan! It would be great to also have real-valued FFT operations like batch_rfft2d() and batch_rifft2d() (which use half as many operations as the complex version). I think this is identical to the current implementation but using cufftExecR2C() and cufftExecC2R() instead of cufftExec()
body_text: Thanks @rryan! It would be great to also have real-valued FFT operations like batch_rfft2d() and batch_rifft2d() (which use half as many operations as the complex version). I think this is identical to the current implementation but using cufftExecR2C() and cufftExecC2R() instead of cufftExec()
body: Thanks @rryan! It would be great to also have real-valued FFT operations like batch_rfft2d() and batch_rifft2d() (which use half as many operations as the complex version). I think this is identical to the current implementation but using cufftExecR2C() and cufftExecC2R() instead of cufftExec()
